description: 学习以f或fe结尾的名词复数变化：变f/fe为v加-es

basic_rules: 以f结尾，变f为v加-es：leaf → leaves, wolf → wolves
以fe结尾，变fe为v加-es：knife → knives, wife → wives
注意：不是所有f/fe结尾都这样变化
有些直接加s：roof → roofs, belief → beliefs
memory_tips: 可以记成：'f要变成v，然后加es'
注意：不是所有f/fe都这样变化
common_errors: I see many leaf. (错误) → I see many leaves. (正确)
The knife are sharp. (错误) → The knives are sharp. (正确)
I have two roof. (错误) → I have two roofs. (正确)

sentences: I see one leaf. → I see many leaves.
The knife is sharp. → The knives are sharp.
This is a wolf. → These are wolves.
I have one wife. → I have two wives.

templates.question: I see many _____ on the tree.
I see many _____ in the forest.
将下列单词按复数变化分类：leaf, knife, roof, wolf, wife, belief
templates.answer: 变f/fe为v加es：leaf, knife, wolf, wife；直接加s：roof, belief
templates.explanation: 大部分f/fe变v加es，少数直接加s

learning_objectives: 掌握以f/fe结尾的名词复数变化规则
能够正确识别需要变v加es的名词

assessment_criteria.excellent: 能够熟练使用f/fe结尾规则，无语法错误
assessment_criteria.good: 基本掌握f/fe结尾规则，偶有错误
assessment_criteria.satisfactory: 了解f/fe结尾规则，需要加强练习
assessment_criteria.needs_improvement: 对f/fe结尾规则不熟悉，需要重新学习
